actionClicks.description: The number of clicks on action buttons in the ad.

adUnitClicks.description: The number of clicks on ad unit components.

approximateUniqueImpressions.description: An approximation of unique ad impressions.

cardClicks.description: The number of clicks on interactive card elements.

cardImpressions.description: The number of times interactive cards were displayed.

clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the ad.

commentLikes.description: The count of likes on comments related to the ad.

comments.description: The number of comments on the ad.

companyPageClicks.description: Clicks on the company page associated with the ad.

conversionValueInLocalCurrency.description: Conversion value in the local currency.

costInLocalCurrency.description: Cost of ad campaign in the local currency.

costInUsd.description: Cost of ad campaign in USD.

documentCompletions.description: Number of completions for document views.

documentFirstQuartileCompletions.description: Completions for first quartile of document views.

documentMidpointCompletions.description: Completions for midpoint of document views.

documentThirdQuartileCompletions.description: Completions for third quartile of document views.

downloadClicks.description: Clicks on download links in the ad.

end_date.description: End date of the ad analytics data.

externalWebsiteConversions.description: Conversions that lead to external websites.

follows.description: Number of follows generated by the ad.

fullScreenPlays.description: Number of times videos were played in fullscreen mode.

impressions.description: Total number of times the ad was displayed.

jobApplications.description: Number of job applications initiated through the ad.

jobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button in the ad.

landingPageClicks.description: Clicks on the landing page associated with the ad.

leadGenerationMailContactInfoShares.description: Shares of contact information through lead generation.

leadGenerationMailInterestedClicks.description: Clicks on expressing interest through lead generation mail.

likes.description: Total likes received on the ad.

oneClickLeadFormOpens.description: Number of times lead forms were opened in one click.

opens.description: The number of times the ad was opened or expanded.

otherEngagements.description: Engagements other than clicks on the ad.

pivotValues.description: Values used for pivoting the analytics.

postClickJobApplications.description: Job applications initiated post-clicking on the ad.

postClickJobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button post-clicking on the ad.

postClickRegistrations.description: Registrations completed post-clicking on the ad.

postViewJobApplications.description: Job applications initiated post-viewing the ad.

postViewJobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button post-viewing the ad.

reactions.description: Total reactions (e.g., like, love, celebrate) on the ad.

registrations.description: Total registrations completed through the ad.

sends.description: Number of messages sent through the ad.

shares.description: Total shares generated by the ad.

start_date.description: Start date of the ad analytics data.

talentLeads.description: Number of leads related to talent acquisition.

textUrlClicks.description: Clicks on text URLs within the ad.

totalEngagements.description: Total number of engagements on the ad.

validWorkEmailLeads.description: Leads generated through valid work emails.

videoCompletions.description: Number of times videos were watched till completion.

videoFirstQuartileCompletions.description: Completions for first quartile of video views.

videoMidpointCompletions.description: Completions for midpoint of video views.

videoStarts.description: Total video starts initiated by users.

videoThirdQuartileCompletions.description: Completions for third quartile of video views.

videoViews.description: Total views of videos in the ad.

viralCardClicks.description: Clicks on interactive card components in viral distribution.

viralCardImpressions.description: Impressions of interactive cards in viral distribution.

viralClicks.description: Total clicks in viral distribution of the ad.

viralCommentLikes.description: Likes received on comments in viral distribution.

viralComments.description: Number of comments in viral distribution of the ad.

viralCompanyPageClicks.description: Clicks on the company page in viral distribution.

viralDocumentCompletions.description: Complete views of documents in viral distribution.

viralDocumentFirstQuartileCompletions.description: First quartile completions of documents in viral distribution.

viralDocumentMidpointCompletions.description: Midpoint completions of documents in viral distribution.

viralDocumentThirdQuartileCompletions.description: Third quartile completions of documents in viral distribution.

viralDownloadClicks.description: Clicks on downloads in viral distribution of the ad.

viralExternalWebsiteConversions.description: External website conversions in viral distribution.

viralExternalWebsitePostClickConversions.description: Post-click conversions on external websites in viral distribution.

viralExternalWebsitePostViewConversions.description: Post-view conversions on external websites in viral distribution.

viralFollows.description: Follows generated in viral distribution of the ad.

viralFullScreenPlays.description: Fullscreen video plays in viral distribution.

viralImpressions.description: Total impressions in viral distribution of the ad.

viralJobApplications.description: Job applications initiated in viral distribution.

viralJobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button in viral distribution of the ad.

viralLandingPageClicks.description: Clicks on landing page in viral distribution.

viralLikes.description: Total likes in viral distribution of the ad.

viralOneClickLeadFormOpens.description: One-click lead form opens in viral distribution.

viralOneClickLeads.description: Leads generated in one click in viral distribution.

viralOtherEngagements.description: Other engagements in viral distribution of the ad.

viralPostClickJobApplications.description: Job applications initiated post-clicking in viral distribution.

viralPostClickJobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button post-clicking in viral distribution.

viralPostClickRegistrations.description: Registrations completed post-clicking in viral distribution.

viralPostViewJobApplications.description: Job applications initiated post-viewing in viral distribution.

viralPostViewJobApplyClicks.description: Clicks on apply job button post-viewing in viral distribution.

viralPostViewRegistrations.description: Registrations completed post-viewing in viral distribution.

viralReactions.description: Total reactions in viral distribution of the ad.

viralRegistrations.description: Total registrations in viral distribution of the ad.

viralShares.description: Total shares in viral distribution of the ad.

viralTotalEngagements.description: Total engagements in viral distribution of the ad.

viralVideoCompletions.description: Completions of videos in viral distribution.

viralVideoFirstQuartileCompletions.description: First quartile completions of videos in viral distribution.

viralVideoMidpointCompletions.description: Midpoint completions of videos in viral distribution.

viralVideoStarts.description: Total video starts in viral distribution of the ad.

viralVideoThirdQuartileCompletions.description: Third quartile completions of videos in viral distribution.

viralVideoViews.description: Total views of videos in viral distribution of the ad.
